short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to identify what version a Squarespace website is using.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Squarespace Version Identifier is a user-friendly Chrome extension designed for web developers, designers, and Squarespace enthusiasts. With just one click, you can quickly find out whether a site is running on Squarespace 7 or 7.1.

Features:
One-Click Detection: Instantly determine the Squarespace version of any website with a single click on the extension icon.
Easy-to-Use: No complicated setup or technical expertise required. Simply add the extension to your browser and you're good to go!
Fast and Efficient: Utilizes a minimalistic approach to provide quick results without slowing down your browser.
Updated for Chrome V3: Fully compatible with the latest Chrome extension standards, ensuring a smooth and secure user experience.

How It Works:
Once you click on the PixelHaze icon in your browser toolbar, the extension scans the webpage you are currently viewing. If it's a Squarespace site, an alert will pop up indicating whether it's version 7 or 7.1. In case the site isn't built on Squarespace, you'll receive a prompt informing you of the same.

Privacy-Friendly:
We respect your privacy. This extension doesn't track your browsing activity, collect personal data, or display ads.
